item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Saturday, 5th February, 2022
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today Saturday, 5th February 2022. With politicking for the 2023 general election gathering momentum, developments in the polity are already pointing to the complexion of the next election. Perhaps, it will be a battle between the old and the new order with Nigerians proving that they have attained political maturity. Indeed, the activities of political actors offer enough basis for tea leaf reading as far as the 2023 season goes.

item.title: You Should Run For President, Group Tells Yahaya Bello
item.description: Governor Yahaya Bello of Kogi State has been asked to declare his interest and run for the office of president in the 2023 presidential election. The Director-General of a group known as the North Central Coalition For Leadership, Umar Ghadaffi, made this known in a statement on Saturday. Ghadaffi said that governor Bello is the most favorable for the office of the president, coming from a geo-political zone (North-Central). He added that the Kogi governor is the right leader who “will lead the birth of a new Nigeria”.

item.title: Former Sierra Leone President, Koroma Arrives Nigeria For Medical Care
item.description: The former President of Sierra Leone, Ernest Bai Koroma, has arrived in Abuja for medical treatment after he was released from house arrest. Koroma, who touched down in Abuja on Friday afternoon, was received by the National Security Adviser (NSA), Nuhu Ribadu and the President of the ECOWAS Commission, Omar Alieu Touray. Recall that on January 17, 2024, the Sierra Leone High Court permitted Koroma to spend a maximum of three months in Nigeria for medical treatment on the condition that his sureties should provide regular medical updates, signed and duly authorised.

item.title: Group 'Spank' Fani-Kayode For Mentioning A Governor In His Defection Game
item.description: Again, former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode, has been spanked for mentioning the governor of Enugu State, Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi in his defection game. FFK had alleged that Ugwuanyi is planning to defect from the People’s Democratic Party, PDP to the ruling All Progressives Congress, APC, Naija News understands. Recall that the Lagos-born politician left PDP for APC on Thursday, a development that wowed many people. Enugu Youth Coalition, EYC in a statement released to newsmen in Enugu on Friday by its National Coordinator, Dr Edwinn Obune, warned Fani-Kayode not to again involve their governor in his political games.

item.title: Jennifer Gibson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Television and film actress who is best recognized for her appearances on the series 24 Hour Rental, Hemlock Grove, and Degrassi: The Next Generation. She was also cast in the 2014 film Maps to the Stars. Before Fame She made her professional acting debut in the 1992 television film A Masculine Ending. Trivia In 2005, she guest starred on an episode of the series The 4400. Family Life She is from the United States.

item.title: Ryan Richards - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Country Music Television reality personality from the show Party Down South who works as a professional diver. He is also a trained pilot. Before Fame He turned down offers to be on varying other reality shows in years prior to appearing on Party Down South. Trivia He racked up social media fame to go along with the reality show fame, accumulating more than 70,000 Twitter followers. Family Life He grew up in Whitesburg, Georgia and would move to Orange Beach, Alabama.

item.title: Jaime Xie - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Luxury influencer with a passion for fashion who jet sets around the world, splitting her time between San Francisco, Los Angeles, New York, Paris, and Tokyo. She was inspired to share her love of high-end fashion through her self-titled fashion and lifestyle blog beginning in 2015. She has attended exclusive events hosted by Gucci, Rolls Royce, LV, Fendi, Dolce & Gabbana, Cartier, and Prada. Before Fame She was an accomplished horseback rider and traveled the country competing up until 2015.

item.title: Maswali Yaibuka Baada ya Moses Kuria Kukutana na Jimmy Wanjigi
item.description: Kuria huonekana kuwa mwanasiasa mjanja na hivyo wakosoaji wake hushuku misimamo yake kisiasaAlizua maswali Ijumaa Julai 9 baada ya kukutana na mgombea wa urais kwa ODM Jimmy WanjigiAjenda za kikao cha wawili hao hazijabainika lakini Kuria alisema milango ya Hustler Nation iko waziMaswali yameibuka baada ya Mbunge wa Gatundu Kusini Moses Kuria kukutana na mfanyabiashara tajika Jimmy Wanjigi. Wanjigi ni mwandani wa kinara wa ODM Raila Odinga na amekuwa mfadhili wake kwenye chaguzi zilizopita.

item.title: Photos From Tinubus Meeting With Anyim, Metuh In Aso Rock [Video]
item.description: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, on Wednesday, received the former Senate President and ex-Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Senator Anyim Pius Anyim, at the State House in Abuja. The Nigerian leader also welcomed a former National Publicity Secretary of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Chief Olisa Metuh, to the Presidential Villa. Both figures who were prominent critics of the All Progressives Congress (APC) leading up to the 2019 elections were welcomed to the State House by the APC National Secretary, Senator Iyiola Omisore.

item.title: Picha za wanasiasa wa ODM wakipiga magoti mbele ya Raila zazua mjadala
item.description: - Picha ya hivi punde inayomwonyesha mwaniaji wa ODM akiwa amepiga magoti mbele ya Raila Odinga kabla ya shughuli ya uteuzi imezua mjadala - Picha hiyo iliashiria kuwa Raila ana uwezo mkubwa katika chama cha ODM - Mwaniaji huyo amekosolewa kwa kupiga magoti mbele ya mwanadamu Ili kupata baraka kuwania katika shughuli ya uteuzi, wawaniaji wengi wanasemekana walipata baraka kutoka kwa Raila Odinga kwa kumpigia magoti. Picha inayoendelea kuenea mitandaoni inaonyesha jinsi alivyo na uwezo mkubwa Raila Odinga katika chama cha ODM.

item.title: Fans Express Concern As Angel Lands in Hospital Days After Pere And Whitemoney
item.description: Fans of Big Brother Naija Shine Ya Eye fourth runner-up, Angel Smith, have expressed concerns after she was hospitalized, a day after the winner of the reality show, Whitemoney and fellow runner-up, Pere Egbi, was also placed on medication. The video shared on social media pictured the reality star receiving medications. The caption on the video read, “ANGEL, feel better soon. May good health envelop you, spurring a quick recovery.” (sic)

item.title: Hours After Presidential Declaration, Osinbajo Dumps Lagos APC
item.description: Vice president, Yemi Osinbajo, has dumped the Lagos State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) for his home state. This is coming shortly after  the vice president addressed Nigerians on his decision to run for the office of the President in 2023. In a tweet via his Twitter handle on Monday, Osinbajo stated that his decision to join the presidential race is to contribute his quota to the development of the country.

She refuted the claims of being an actress or having any business with Nollywood, stating that people should not force any career on her.

item.description: A DoorDash driver was fired after a customer claimed they didn't complete a delivery, they then confronted the woman at her job. item.title: IPOB Sit-at-home Order Devilish, Foolish
item.description: The Chairman of the Southeast Governors Forum and Ebonyi State Governor, David Umahi, has condemned the sit-at-home directive previously issued by the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB). Naija News reports that IPOB had since suspended the sit-at-home directive but Southeast residents have continued to observe the order every Monday due to fears of being attacked by members of the group. Speaking to members of the All Progressives Congress, APC, on Sunday, Umahi described the directive as devilish and foolish.

item.title: This Is Who Taylor Swift Wrote Mean About Details
item.description: "Mean" was a song off Taylor Swift's 2010 album "Speak Now," which was re-released in 2023. Unlike some of her other songs, "Mean" is not about an ex. In 2021, Taylor Swift began re-recording her first six albums after losing her masters to former music manager Scooter Braun. In June 2023, she released "Speak Now (Taylor's Version)" where fans got to hear updated versions of their favorite songs from the 2010 album as well as a few new ones.

item.title: Who Is Bob Odenkirk's Son? Nathan Tells Followers Dad Will Be OK

Bob was on set when he collapsed for no apparent reason. Thankfully, crew members immediately called an ambulance and the actor was rushed to the hospital in Albuquerque.

Southern Group Attacks CNG Over Comment On Afenifere
item.description: The Southern Nigeria Frontier (SNF) has berated the Coalition of Northern (CNG) for describing Yoruba socio-political group, Afenifere as a terrorist group. Naija News earlier reported that the CNG in a statement by its spokesperson, Abdulazeez Suleiman, in Abuja on Saturday asked the federal government to proscribe Afenifere for allegedly undermining peace, security and peaceful coexistence of the country. Reacting in a statement on Monday, SNF’s spokesman, Olufemi Lawson, described the Northern group as a national security threat.

item.title: 2023: The North Should Rest And Allow South Produce Next President
item.description: A former Kano State Governor and current Chairperson of the Senate Committee on INEC, Kabiru Gaya has stated that the North should take a break from the presidency. This is as he declared that personally, he would support the southern region for the 2023 presidency for the sake of equity. Gaya made his position known at the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) Forum on Tuesday where he submitted that in the spirit of fairness, the south should produce Nigeria’s next president while the north should produce the vice president.

item.title: Jonathan Tried To Jail Me, Ignored Our Friendship El-Rufai
item.description: The Governor of Kaduna State, Nasir El-Rufai, on Tuesday, disclosed that former President, Goodluck Jonathan, almost put him in prison because he felt he was a threat to his second term ambition. El-Rufai, in an interview published in The Point, said although the former President was his very close friend during his days as Bayelsa State deputy governor, he persecuted him because he believed those who told him that he was a threat.

Disaster and hilarity follow the pair through Shanghai as they seek out Din's childhood friend Lina (Natasha Liu Bordizzo).

item.title: Tagging Bandits As Terrorists Won't Change Anything
item.description: Controversial Kaduna-based Islamic scholar Sheikh Ahmad Gumi has accused the Muhammadu Buhari-led Federal Government of succumbing to the blackmail to tag bandits as terrorists. Recall that Justice Taiwo Taiwo of the Federal High Court, Abuja, had declared that the activities of bandits in Nigeria is terrorism. The court also directed the federal government to publish it’s proclamation in the official gazette. Mohammed Abubakar, the Director of Public Prosecution (DPP), who filed the motion, had said President Buhari gave the directive for the proscription of terrorist groups in the country.

item.title: What It's Like to Be a Stressed Out Baker on 'The Great British Baking Show"
item.description: If you think baking a cake on TV can't be that hard, here's what it's really like to be a baker on 'The Great British Baking Show." Source: BBCAfter binging an entire season of The Great British Baking Show (or The Great British Bake-Off, as its known in the U.K.), I'm always left wondering: why would an amateur baker put themselves through 10 weeks of stress, emotional torment, and melting ganaches if they weren't total masochists?

item.title: Canadian Justice Minister Calls For Nnamdi Kanu's Release, Blasts Malami
item.description: The Minister of Justice and Solicitor-General of the Government of Alberta, Canada, Kelechi Madu, has blasted the Minister of Justice and Attorney-General of the Federation in Nigeria, Abubakar Malami, over the arrest of the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu. Madu in a post on his LinkedIn page, said if the IPOB leader was truly abducted in Kenya, then the Nigerian minister is a disgrace to the rule of law.

item.title: NEW MUSIC: Tiwa Savage - My Darlin
item.description: From this new one from the Tiwa Savage, it looks like we are not moving on from the popular 'Doro' theme any time soon. item.title: Army Moves Arrested Thugs To Ondo Barracks
item.description: The Nigerian Army has detained suspected political thugs at the 323 Artillery Brigade barracks in Akure, Ondo State. Naija News earlier reported that the hoodlums were coming from Ibadan, the Oyo State capital to Ekiti, to disrupt the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, primary elections in the state. The thugs were nabbed around 3 am on Wednesday along Ita Awure/Efon Junction in Ekiti by joint security forces consisting of soldiers and policemen.

item.title: Boko Haram: What I Told Leah Sharibu's Father
item.description: Former Senate President, Abubakar Bukola Saraki, has revealed that he spoke to the father of Leah Sharibu, the abducted Dapchi girl still in captivity of Boko Haram. Naija News reports that Thursday marked the second year of Leah Sharibu in the captivity of insurgents. Recall that Leah was the only Christian among the 110 students of Government Girls Secondary School, Dapchi, Yobe state, northern Nigeria, abducted on February 19, 2018. While other girls were released by the insurgents following Federal Government’s intervention, Miss Sharibu was allegedly held back on account of her alleged refusal to renounce her Christian faith and has since been in Boko Haram’s captivity.

item.title: Niniola Gets A Call From Diddy After Four Years Of Sending Messages Without Response
item.description: The long-awaited dream of Nigerian Singer and songwriter, Niniola Apata, popularly known as Niniola,has finally come to pass as American music star cum businessman, Diddy reached out to her, after four years of futile unresponsive messages. In the video shared by the excited singer, the billionaire music producer, Diddy narrated how Niniola sent several private messages to him since 2018, but he could not respond due to the several other messages in his Direct Message (DM).

item.title: Ukraine Under Attack Along Russia, Belarus Borders
item.description: Russia is currently attacking the northern and southern borders of Ukraine through artillery fire and land invasion. The border guard service while revealing the development on Thursday added that Ukrainian forces are returning fire. According to the guards, the Russian forces are receiving support from Belarus, adding that an attack has been launched from Crimea, the Russian-occupied peninsula region on Ukraine’s southern flank. The border guards said, “Attacks on border units, border detachments and checkpoints are carried out with the use of artillery, heavy equipment and small arms.

item.title: Don't Sack Secondus Now - David Mark, Senator Abaribe, Others Warn PDP
item.description: The David Mark-led Reconciliation Committee set up by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has kicked against the sacking of its Chairman, Uche Secondus. The committee warned that sacking the National Working Committee (NWC) of the party headed by Secondus before the expiration of its tenure may plunge the opposition party into many legal battles. It was gathered that the Mark committee recommended that the new committee that would be elected at the party’s convention should only resume duties after the expiration of the present NWC’s tenure in December 9.

item.title: Emefiele Is My Friend, I Will Never Abandon Him

Naija News recalls that the Department of State Servic (DSS) and officials of the Nigeria Correctional Service had engaged in a tug-of-war over the custody of Emefiele. Emefiele, had during his hearing in the federal high court in Ikoyi, Lagos, pleaded not guilty to two counts of illegal possession of firearms and live ammunition.

item.title: Seriake Dickson Released, Reveals Why EFCC Grilled Him For Several Hours
item.description: Former Bayelsa State Governor, Seriake Dickson has been released by the Economic and Finacial Crimes Commission (EFCC). The former Governor, who is the current senator representing Bayelsa West in the National Assembly was questioned by the EFCC in Abuja for several hours on Tuesday, Naija News earlier reported. The anti-graft agency is investigating allegations bordering on abuse of office and misappropriation of public funds during his eight-year rule of Bayelsa State between 2012 and 2020.

LASTMA disclosed that the overturned truck and some parts were damaged due to the crash.

item.title: Troops Engage Boko Haram In Fierce Battle, Kill 19 Terrorists, Destroy Gun Trucks
item.description: Troops of the Nigerian Military on Tuesday inflicted heavy casualties on Boko Haram terrorists in Rann local government area of Borno State. It was gathered that the terrorists had attempted to attack the military base through an ambush attack but met superior tactics and firepower which resulted in the killing of several of them and the destruction of their gun trucks. Naija News understands not fewer than 19 terrorists were killed during the fierce gun battle with the soldiers while gun trucks and other items belonging to the insurgents were also destroyed.

item.title: Wike Does Not Care About The People Living In FCT

The Senator made the claim on Wednesday at an event organised by activist Moses Paul, to mark the first anniversary of the 2023 presidential election. She slammed Wike for what she described as ‘I don’t care attitude.

item.title: Fubara Sponsoring Kidnappings In Abuja To Discredit Wike
item.description: The chairman of Ikwerre Local Government Area in Rivers State, Samuel Nwanosike, has accused the State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, of being part of those sponsoring kidnappings and other forms of insecurity in Abuja. He said Fubara is supporting the insecurity in Abuja because he wants his predecessor, Nyesom Wike, to be sacked as the Minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT). Speaking while addressing some of his supporters, Nwanosike, however, said the wish of Fubara and his associates to see Wike removed from office would not be fulfilled.

item.description: The Federal High Court sitting in Abuja has struck out eight of the amended terrorism charges brought against the leader of the Indigenous People Of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu by the federal government of Nigeria. The presiding judge, Justice Binta Nyako on Friday ruled against the federal government in eight out of the fifteen charges when the matter came up for hearing in court. She maintained that the affected counts which were struck out do not disclose any offence against Kanu.

item.title: Armed Bandits Kill Zamfara House Of Assembly Member

item.title: Dangerous, Inimical, Poses Threat To Nation's Building, Says Ganduje
item.description: Kano State Governor, Abdullahi Umar Ganduje, has said that unless an urgent solution is reached on the five-month-old strike action embarked upon by the Academic Staff Union of University (ASUU) this issue may not only destroy the students’ academic performance but may eventually lead them to join miscreants, thereby posing a serious threat to the nation. Ganduje made the assertion on Tuesday in Kano at the Government House, Tuesday, while responding to the peaceful protest organised by the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) in solidarity with the cause of the striking ASUU, saying the crisis must be resolved to save the system.

Before Fame He attended McCosh Elementary School. Trivia Carolyn's husband, Roy, and his half-brother Milam abducted 14-year-old Till, removed one of his eyes, and shot him before tying a 70-pound cotton gin fan to his neck with barbed wire and dumping him in the Tallahatchie River.

item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) on Wednesday presented a Certificate of Return to its presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar. Naija News reports that this development is coming after the former Vice President won the presidential primary of the main opposition party last Saturday. Atiku polled 371 votes to defeat his closest contender Nyesom Wike, Governor of Rivers State, who polled 237 votes. The National Chairman of the party, Senator Iyorcha Ayu, presented the certificate to Atiku at the NEC Hall, PDP National Secretariat, Wadata Plaza, Abuja.

item.title: Ronnie DeVoe bio: age, height, net worth, who is he married to?
item.description: Ronnie DeVoe is famously known as an American rapper and singer. He is a member of both the pop/R&B groups New Edition and Bell Biv DeVoe. With the latter, he has made a significant contribution to the studio albums Hootie Mack and Poison. His other group, New Edition, has released amazing albums, including Under the Blue Moon and All for Love. Besides performing and recording, he is also the co-owner of a real estate company in Atlanta, Georgia, known as DeVoe Broker Associates.

item.title: Savannah LaBrant - Age, Family, Bio
Super Eagles 2022 World Cup Qualifying Fixtures Revealed
item.description: Nigeria’s National Football team, Super Eagles will host Liberia in Lagos on September 3 for their qualifying schedule for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar. Naija News reports that the second round qualifying fixtures were released on Thursday, July 29. The three-time African champions would again travel to Cape Verde on September 7. The Super Eagles play a double-header against the Central African Republic (CAR) between October 6 and 12. Nigeria will host the first leg, before travelling for the reverse fixture.

item.title: Video Alleging Okorocha And His Son-In-Law, Uche Nwosu Are Responsible For Attacks In Imo Emerges
item.description: A video of a criminal suspect alleging that Rochas Okorocha and his son-in-law, Uche Nwosu are responsible for the attacks in Imo state has surfaced online. Recall that Naija News earlier reported that Nwosu was arrested on Sunday, December 26 during his late mother thanksgiving service at St Peter’s Anglican Church, Eziama Obieri in the Nkwerre Local Government Area of the state. Twenty-four hours after his arrest the police set him free.

item.title: Who is David Laid? Age, height, girlfriend, work out routine
item.description: David Laid is an American-based bodybuilder, fitness model, and influencer. He is famous for his body's transformation on YouTube videos. The videos show how Laid changed tremendously, from a skinny boy to a powerlifter. TABLE OF CONTENTSDavid Laid was once the subject of mockery in school due to his skinny body. This is one of the reasons he focused on illuminating his life and became one of the best bodybuilders on YouTube.
